transpositions.title: Membership types at the TC level
transpositions.text:
# Membership types at the TC level

~? Types of membership at the TC level:
- Participating members
- Observing members
- External liaisons
- Internal liaisons

~? Participating members
must be full ISO members
and are committed to:
- voting
- identifying experts
- providing national delegations
- engaging stakeholders

~? Observing members
- follow
- can contribute

~? External liaisons
- are international or regional organizations
- participate and follow
- help ensure wider acceptance
- 3 subtypes: A, B, and C

~? Internal liaisons
ensure effective collaboration between committees
